com.viaoa.html

Class OATextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.html.OAHtmlComponent
      • com.viaoa.html.OATextField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OAPasswordField, OATextArea

    public class OATextField
extends OAHtmlComponent
        [Java Code]
    OATextField txt = new OATextField(hub,"name");
    form.add("txtName", txt);
    ....
    [HTML Code]
    <input type="text" name="txtName" value="<%=form.getTextField("txtName").getValue()%>" size="16" maxlength="75">
    =>
    <input type="text" name="txtName" value="test data" size="16" maxlength="75">
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMax

        public int getMax()

      • setMax

        public void setMax(int x)
        max length of text. If -1 (default) then unlimited. All input will be truncated to this amount without a warning

      • getHtmlText

        public String getHtmlText()
        HTML "safe", "formatted" value stored for textfield. Converts null to "", converts <,>,",& to html strings.
        See Also:
        - same as calling getHtmlText(), to get "real" raw value

      • getValue

        public String getValue()
        same as calling getHtmlText()
        Returns:
        HTML "safe" vaule
        See Also:
        getText()
